name: The Creature Dies.
description:
An incremental, existential anti-Tamagotchi.

Will you submit to the inexorable? Or will you try to keep it alive?

Created for Ludum Dare 46.
Game and music by Mikhail Fiadotau.
Based on idea by Evgeny Bychkov.
Font: Please Don't Leave NBP by Total FontGeek DTF (with minor modifications).
